landing.title: ደብተርLink – Smart Education Hub
landing.subtitle: A multi-school, multi-role, intelligent school management ecosystem for Ethiopia
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Run a Modern School
landing.featuresSubtitle: Comprehensive features designed specifically for Ethiopian educational institutions

smartAttendance.title: Smart Attendance
smartAttendance.description: Real-time attendance tracking with automatic parent notifications and offline support.

assignmentManagement.title: Assignment Management
assignmentManagement.description: Upload, submit, and grade assignments with automatic reminders and deadline tracking.

parentTeacherHub.title: Parent-Teacher Hub
parentTeacherHub.description: Secure messaging platform with file sharing, read receipts, and push notifications.

gradeAnalytics.title: Grade Analytics
gradeAnalytics.description: Comprehensive grade management with performance charts and exportable report cards.

aiPredictions.title: AI Predictions
aiPredictions.description: Machine learning algorithms predict at-risk students and suggest interventions.

behaviorTracking.title: Behavior Tracking
behaviorTracking.description: Monitor student conduct, award positive behavior, and notify parents instantly.

appealSystem.title: Appeal System
appealSystem.description: Structured workflow for complaints with escalation, timeline tracking, and resolution.

resourceLibrary.title: Resource Library
resourceLibrary.description: Digital repository for notes, past exams, videos, and learning materials.

dualCalendar.title: Dual Calendar
dualCalendar.description: Support for both Ethiopian and Gregorian calendars with event management.

multiSchoolSupport.title: Multi-School Support
multiSchoolSupport.description: Multi-tenant architecture allowing school chains to manage multiple campuses.

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.description: Record data offline and sync automatically when connection is restored.

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-Based Access
roleBasedAccess.description: Granular permissions for admins, directors, teachers, students, and parents.
